column4: Fill / Inner Line / Symbol / Label Colour
column5: Border / Outer Line / Symbol Border Colour
column11: Symbol / Label Background (yes = Only Symbol, yes+ = Both Label and the Symbol, no = No Background)

column3: highway = 'residential' or highway = 'unclassified' or highway = 'service' or highway = 'living_street'

waterway in ('stream', 'canal', 'tidal_channel', 'flowline', 'drain', 'ditch' ) and (other_tags is null or (INSTR(other_tags, '"intermittent"=>"yes"') = 0 and INSTR(other_tags, '"seasonal "=>"yes"') = 0))
landuse = 'farmland' or landuse = 'orchard' or place = 'farm' or landuse = 'plant_nursery'
name = 'Indian Ocean' and natural = 'water' and INSTR(other_tags, '"water"=>"ocean"') > 0
